name: treetime
description:
only one input is required: the z button. the game moves at its own pace

this is for weekly game jam 160. the theme for this jam was "nothing lasts forever", and so, i was compelled to make a game about ephemerality.

be the soil, be a seed;
be the branches, be the leaves;
be the rain- and the wind.
be the fleeting tree, that grows and grows;
then the dying tree, that emanates its very life.
life that's present, and then blissfully absent.
